      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ListeningExecutorService getListeningExecutorService() 
      void runStep(Step step)
      Note that this method blocks until the specified command terminates.
      void runStepForBuildTarget(Step step, BuildTarget buildTarget)
      Runs a BuildStep for a given BuildRule.
      <T> ListenableFuture<T> runStepsAndYieldResult(List<Step> steps, Callable<T> interpretResults, BuildTarget buildTarget)
      In a new thread, executes of the list of commands and then invokes interpretResults to return a value that represents the output of the commands.
